document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I'm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">lost </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">now </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">found </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Shall </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">still </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">transport </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">once </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">those </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">Jasper </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">Gates </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Blazed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">open </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">suddenly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">awkward </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">gazing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">face </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">Angels </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">softly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">peered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">touched </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">fleeces, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Almost </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">cared </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I'm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">banished </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">now </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">How </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">foreign </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">You'll </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">Sir </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">when </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">Savior's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">face </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">Turns </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: If I'm lost now
